products.title: Infusion Asc White Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc white perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Infusion White Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The infusion white pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0005 fabric colour: white headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Infusion Solar White Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Their range of infusion solar pleated blinds is an excellent alternative to a venetian or roller blind. The solar feature means the blind will block sunlight and ultraviolet rays. The infusion solar white pleated skylight blind will transform the look of your home. Ideal for sloping windows, this beautiful blind is elegant and stylish. Product id: db-pls0029 fabric colour: white headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.

products.title: Infusion Solar Flame Retardant White Pleated Skylight Blind
products.description: Infusion solar fr not only brings subtle and vibrant colours to your home but the added benefit of a solar control coating to reduce direct sunlight giving a pleasant atmosphere. A flame-retardant fabric makes this perfect for kitchens. Product id: db-pls0119 fabric colour: white material: 100% polyester headrail: white rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.
